Name: Student Solutions Manual for Physics for Scientists and Engineers: A Strategic Approach Vol 1(Chs1-19)

ReviewList.Text: I wound up sending this back as I wound up with a copy of the instructor's solution manual.  The solutions are thorough and very helpful, but you really need more of them.  I think I'm being generous with the stars actually - less than half the solutions are present.  Yeah, more than half the odd numbered solutions are provided, but I'd still like to see more.

This is a complete ripoff. The money-grabbing publishers want over $40 dollars for the solutions manual to ONE FOURTH of the problems in the book. More importantly, NONE OF THE CHALLENGE PROBLEMS ARE INCLUDED, making this an absolutely useless volume. The only reason someone would buy a solutions manual would be for a walk-through of the more difficult problems.
This solution manual has less than half the solutions in the book. I expected the odd answered questioned but instead it's like every 4 problems...
for college physics as a reference or a main course material; what else can be said in a review; if you are a physics major, this book is essential.

Solutions manual implies that it relates to the content of the text book.  This book just works through problems from what I could tell.  I bought it to help me understand specific problems and it was completely useless.  waste of my time and money.  I got a lot more help from yahoo answers.
The answers were limited. When trying to learn physics, it is nice to have the ability to go through a problem to see where you made the mistake. In the end, it is better to use the professor.
Solutions are explained with detail making it easy to follow the thought process. Adds to overall lesson. Recommend this purchase.
This item is a very important part to successfully completing my degree goals.
